alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton, southern Marion and southeastern Boone Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 701 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pyatt to Dugger to near Pruitt. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yellville... Western Grove... Pyatt... Valley Springs... Dugger... Olvey... Carver... Duff... Clark Hill... Dodd City... Pruitt... Crawford... Summit... Everton... St. Joe... Pindall... Zinc... Bass... Marble Falls... Yardelle... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
